lead_paragraph: Tommy Armour III double-bogeyed No. 18 to finish with a one-over-par 71 and fall into a six-way tie for the lead after two rounds at the Stanford St. Jude Championship in Memphis. On a day with gusty wind and firm greens, only 13 players were under par. It was the most players tied for the lead at the halfway point on the PGA Tour since a six-way tie last year at the Shell Houston Open.
